name: Forty-two Martyrs of Ammorium
troparia: (Tone 4) Your martyrs, O Lord,* by their passion acquired the crowns of incorruptibility from You, our God.* For possessing Your power, they overcame the torturers* and shattered the feeble insolence of demons.* By their supplications, save our souls!
kontakia: (Tone 2) We bring crowns of glory to these newly appearing stars* who manifested their faith by suffering for Christ.* As real pillars and helpers of Christâ€™s reign,* they pray to Him in behalf of all of us.
